attributes.action: Delay Net Zero to save our Jobs our Industry our way of Life.
attributes.additional_details: The unrealistic Net Zero targets will have an adverse effect on people’s income their jobs their industries and hand many industries to China.
attributes.background: Reduce the speed of net zero implementation and unrealistic net zero targets creating uncertainty in Industry.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a specific action. The UK has committed to reaching net zero by 2050. We are not sure exactly how you would like this target to change, and what actions you would like the Government to take to slow down reaching this target. You could start a petition setting out clearly what you would like.

You may wish to sign this petition:

Hold a referendum on achieving net zero goals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701342
